JavaPipe is a well known Java web hosting and DDoS protection provider from Utah, USA, that has been founded back in 2001.

Its security experts work with RioRey hardware and custom developed DDoS mitigation devices to combat the most complex DDoS attacks and keep clients safe from cyber threats.

Recently JavaPipe's USA network has been migrated from Ashburn to New York. Along with the new location new DDoS protected VPS offers became available.

Each VPS node uses the latest Intel Xeon CPUs and fast DDR3 RAM for the best possible performance. The storage backend consists of local SSDs (solid state drives), which provides a huge performance boost compared to HDD based storage.

With the included DDoS protection and high-end hardware, JavaPipe's VPS offers are perfect for sensitive applications that require high performance, such as game servers.

DDoS Mitigation at JavaPipe
JavaPipe uses three different layers to protect its VPS hosting environment from DDoS attacks. Each layer mitigates different types of DDoS. This granular DDoS mitigation strategy makes it so efficient.

1st Layer of DDoS Defense: ACLs at carrier level to mitigate volumetric DDoS (reflection attacks), such as DNS, NTP or SSDP amplification
2nd Layer of DDoS Defense: Powerful RioRey DDoS mitigation hardware to mitigate mostly TCP-based DDoS attacks with many packets per second
3rd Layer of DDoS Defense: Stateful in-house DDoS firewall that detects and stops remaining TCP- and UDP-based attack traffic within less than 1 second

This multi-layer DDoS mitigation assures that even small or very complex attacks are being stopped within less than just a second to keep your VPS online at all times. This is also perfect for protection of VoIP applications which require very sophisticated protection methods to avoid audio/video stuttering when under attack.

No matter if you host a game server, TeamSpeak, Camfrog or web application on one of our VPS products, our multi-layer DDoS protection will keep it online.
